p: The plant species contained several phytochemicals including alkaloids, megastigmanes, flavonol triglycosides, phenolics, cyclopeptides, and essential oils ( Moghadamtousi et al., 2015). It has been reported that acetogenins are the most prevalent bioactive compounds of Annonaceae family, including A. muricata. Acetogenins is a unique group of derivatives of long chain fatty acids ( Sun et al., 2016). Acetogenins has been documented to have anti-proliferation activity on human prostate cancer cell PC-3 ( Sun et al., 2016). So far, there is dearth of information of these plant activities against Acanthamoeba spp.
